item.title: HDR Image Formats (V): Understanding Headroom in Gainmap
item.description: Through a case study, understand a seemingly redundant parameter when encoding HDR images: the role of Alternate HDR Headroom in the ISO 21496-1 standard

item.title: A New Python AVIF Encoding Option: ImageCodecs
item.description: Encode high bit-depth NumPy arrays directly to AVIF in Python using ImageCodecs and libavif, with HDR, lossless, and quality/speed options.

item.title: Decoding an Adaptive HDR Tone Mapping Method (Wang, 2025)
item.description: Adaptive HDR-to-SDR tone mapping for 0-1000 nits HDR to SDR. Uses max RGB luminance, tone compression, detail and dark enhancement. Wang et al. (2025).

item.title: HDR Image Formats (IV): ISO 21496-1 the Unified Gainmap
item.description: ISO 21496-1 standardizes Gainmap metadata, defining HDR imaging with a universal JPEG APP2 format, unifying previously proprietary formats like UltraHDR.

item.title: A Quick Analysis of the X2D II 100C File Format
item.description: Hasselblad HNCS HDR outputs Ultra HDR JPEG with Gainmap and P3 color via Phocus, the first medium format camera with end-to-end HDR.

item.title: HDR Image Formats (III): UltraHDR and MPF
item.description: Identify UltraHDR images by detecting hdrgm:Version=1.0 in the JPEG's metadata, per Google's spec, which includes a primary image and gainmap for HDR rendering.

item.title: HDR Image Formats (II): JPEG and Its Modifications
item.description: Learn JPEG file structure: SOI/EOI markers, metadata, JFIF format. Use a free parser to analyze binary segments (FF D8, FF D9) and compressed data.

item.title: Decoding HDR Image Formats (I): Basic Concepts of Gainmap
item.description: Gainmaps and UltraHDR enhance JPEGs with dual-layer HDR, using a base image and a gainmap with XMP metadata like Min, Max, and Gamma.

item.description: iCAM06: HDR rendering with color models & tone compression for accurate display reproduction.
